definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Like the SDGs themselves, cooperatives are people-centred.
sentences.chinese: 合作社与可持续发展目标一样，也是以人为本。

sentences.english: The company emphasizes humanist, Customer-friendliness and first service forever.
sentences.chinese: 公司强调以人为本，以客为尊，服务永远第一。

sentences.english: At the same time, implementation of people-centered concept of curriculum leadership to achieve this requirement exactly.
sentences.chinese: 以人为本的课程领导理念恰恰体现了这一要求。

sentences.english: Modern nursing people-oriented, emphasis on patient-centered.
sentences.chinese: 现代护理以人为本，强调以病人为中心。

sentences.english: So the Chinese teaching with multi-media aids in primary school still needs to fo…
sentences.chinese: 所以，多媒体辅助语文教学需以人为本。

sentences.english: Where there is persevere in putting people first, where is the guarantee of the eternal life of architectural decoration industry.
sentences.chinese: 坚持以人为本是建筑装饰装修业生命永存的所在。

sentences.english: The company advocates the philosophy of "people-oriented, moving forward with times, innovation and development".
sentences.chinese: 公司崇尚“以人为本”，与时俱进，开拓创新。

sentences.english: Our people-first philosophy has always been the bedrock of our value system.
sentences.chinese: 我们“以人为本”的理念一直是公司价值体系的根基。

sentences.english: Adhering to the Mass Line is the only way to implement Anthropocentrism thoroughly .
sentences.chinese: 坚持走群众路线是全面贯彻落实以人为本的必由之路。

sentences.english: Will adhere to people-centered, create a desirable living environment in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 将坚持以人为本，创建上海宜居环境。

sentences.english: Hao Sheng adhere to people-oriented, customer-focused service culture.
sentences.chinese: 昊盛公司坚持以人为本，以客为尊的服务精神。

sentences.english: Company firmly holds that the talent is the basis and the quality is the key of company's development.
sentences.chinese: 公司坚持以人为本，人才建设与质量控制齐抓共管。

sentences.english: In contemporary China, the realization of people-centered principle can not exist without the legislation.
sentences.chinese: 在当代中国，以人为本原则的实现离不开立法活动。

sentences.english: The key to construct the harmonious campus is to firmly establish the principle that people are the foremost.
sentences.chinese: 建设和谐校园，核心是要牢固确立以人为本理念。

sentences.english: Therefore, "human-centered" value principle should be insisted in the construction of the university system.
sentences.chinese: 大学制度建设要坚持“以人为本”的价值原则。

sentences.english: The people-oriented concept should promote the cause of keeping peasants' rights and interests.
sentences.chinese: 要用以人为本理念推进农民维权事业。

definition: to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
based on.../in conformance with../taking as one's main principle
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to implement/to put into practice/to carry out
to follow through/to carry through to the end
